summary: With this mod you can summon 5 Chaurus Hunters Mounts and Followers wherever you want + you can find 2 Companions Chaurus hunters in the Whiterun stable.The DLC Dawnguard is required.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b][size="7"] Chaurus Hunters Mounts and Followers[/size][/b] by gg77[/color] [color=#00ff00]version 1.5[/color] (Dawnguard DLC is required) and [color=#00ff00]version 1.5 BIS[/color] (Dawnguard and Dragonborn DLCs are required)

[color=#00ff00]Optional File: Esp version Française pour la version 1.5 ou pour la version 1.5 BIS[/color]

"Chaurus Hunter" allow you to summon 5 Chaurus Hunters Mounts and -simple- Followers wherever you want + you can find 2 Companions Chaurus Hunters in the Whiterun Stable.

You can easily DISMISS when you want with a "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Chaurus Hunter"

[i][color=#ff0000] They can FLY, just above the ground… [/color][/i]

Now you have the Flyable Chaurus Hunters in my new mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59433/?]Fully Flying Chaurus Hunters [/url]!


->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]DxZ296POXpo[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=578245summonchaurushuntermountfollower2.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/578245summonchaurushuntermountfollower2.jpg[/img][/url]

To access in Vvardenfell (Morrowind) and Cyrodiil (Oblivion) with these mounts you have the 2 mods WIP: [url=http://morroblivion.com/]SKYWIND and SKYBLIVION [/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=596596flyingscrib.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/596596flyingscrib.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000] INSTALLATION (very important) [/color]

[color=#ff8c00][i] Only for the manual installation:[/i][/color]

1) [size="7"][color=#ff0000] You have to put the folder « Data » in "...Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim "[/color][/size]

[color=#ff8c00][i] For the manual and the NMM installations:[/i][/color]

2) [color=#ff0000] You must place the new .esp at the bottom of the list in the "Data Files" when you launch the game to obtain the 6 books...(Normally, this is done automatically !) [/color]

3) (Only if you have download other mods "Summon...") You must INSTALL the summons (my other mods "summon") ONE BY ONE ! (ALL my mods are STANDALONE !)

You can find the Spells tomes: "Summon XXXX" and the "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Chaurus Hunter" at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whiterun/Blancherive) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais Bleu in Solitude).

Duration of the summon: 10 min.

4) You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):

[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001


These settings allow you to see all mounts (of my mods) correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=780678Mountsandfollowers1.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/780678Mountsandfollowers1.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000] Bugs or Problems [/color]

1) If you have any problem with this mount, you can try a FAST TRAVEL...

2) You can only have one Follower at a time: if you want a different one (in my other mods), you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If telling the follower to return at home (With message: “Your companion heads home”) doesn't dismiss him, or if you have "lost" the “active” Follower, you can try this:

Type “²” key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

3) With [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster [/url], or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) in the Data Files when you launch the game

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=228840chaurushuntermountsfollowers1.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/228840chaurushuntermountsfollowers1.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000] Credits [/color]

Thanks to [color=#ff0000]JSnider193[/color] for the new textures of the Chaurus Hunters ( Blood, Reptile, Pebbled) in his mod (« Modders resources and tutorials »): [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6472/?]Critter Variants [/url] ("You can modify and use as needed")

Thanks to [color=#ff0000] Grohiik [/color] for the textures of the Swamp Chaurus Hunter and [color=#ff0000] Lifestorock[/color] for the mesh/textures of the Flying Scrib in the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24913/?]Skyrim Immersive Creatures [/url]by lifestorock

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=381704chaurushuntermountfollower2.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/381704chaurushuntermountfollower2.jpg[/img][/url]

Russian site [url=http://www.gamemodding.net/ru/skyrim/skyrim-monsters/44895-summon-chaurus-hunters-mounts-and-followers.html] GameModding [/url]

Fan site [url=http://dragonporn.ldblog.jp/archives/6953632.html]Fansite Blog Dragonporn [/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=487970Littlechaurushunter1.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/487970Littlechaurushunter1.jpg[/img][/url]



This mod is also on the[url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198019117505/myworkshopfiles/?appid=72850] Workshop/Steam [/url]




->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[color=#ff0000][size=5]My Mods[/size][/color]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-
